text_logic_form: The lines $PR$ and $KL$ are parallel to each other.
The length of the line $KN$ is $9$.
The length of the line $LN$ is $16$.
The length of the line $PM$ is twice the length of the line $KP$.
Find the length of the line $KM$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The lines $PR$ and $KL$ are parallel to each other.
The length of the line $KN$ is $9$.
The length of the line $LN$ is $16$.
The length of the line $PM$ is twice the length of the line $KP$.
Find the length of the line $KM$.
diagram_logic_form: The point $N$ lies on the line $LK$.
The point $Q$ lies on the line $RP$.
The point $R$ lies on the line $LM$.
The point $P$ lies on the line $MK$.
The line $RM$ is perpendicular to the line $MP$.
The line $QN$ is perpendicular to the line $NK$.
line_instances: There are lines $LN$, $NK$, and $LK$, forming a triangle $LNK$.
There are lines $RQ$, $QP$, and $QP$, forming a triangle $RQP$.
There are lines $NQ$, $QM$, and $NM$, forming a triangle $NQM$.
